intro: Noccaea kovatsii, commonly known as the Kovats' honesty, is a flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of Central Asia. It belongs to the Brassicaceae family, which includes many species of mustard and related plants. The plant is characterized by its small, white flowers and basal rosette of narrow, lance-shaped leaves. It thrives in rocky, well-drained soils and is adapted to cold, arid environments. Noccaea kovatsii is often found in alpine meadows and is a relatively rare species due to its specific habitat requirements.
